Consider using a password manager and enabling two-factor authentication.';}else if(input.includes('phishing')||input.includes('email')){return'To protect against phishing attacks, always verify sender authenticity, check URLs carefully, avoid clicking suspicious links, and never provide sensitive information via email.';}else if(input.includes('malware')||input.includes('virus')){return'To prevent malware infections, keep your software updated, use reputable antivirus software, avoid downloading from untrusted sources, and be cautious with email attachments.';}else if(input.includes('firewall')||input.includes('network')){return'Network security best practices include using firewalls, securing Wi-Fi networks with WPA3, regularly updating router firmware, and monitoring network traffic for suspicious activity.';}else{return'I\'m here to help with cybersecurity questions!
